metadata.title: CVE-2016-2146 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The am_read_post_data function in mod_auth_mellon before 0.11.1 does notlimit the amount of data read, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (worker process crash, web server deadlock, or memoryconsumption) via a large amount of POST data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2146` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-auth-mellon - 0.12.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-mellon package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12.0-1').
